entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/jasper-reporting-service/deployment/resources.yaml -p DB_SERVER=geodb-i.rootso.org -p GEO_DB_SERVER=geodb-t.verw.rootso.org -p IMDAS_DB_SERVER=srsofaioi18943.verw.rootso.org -p DB_PUB=pub -p DB_EDIT=edit -p DB_CONFIG=soconfig -p DB_SOGIS=sogis -p DB_IMDAS=imdaspro -p USER_SOGIS_SERVICE=sogis_service -p PW_SOGIS_SERVICE=${PwdSogisService} -p USER_REPORT_SERVER=report_server -p PW_REPORT_SERVER=${PwdReportServer} -p USER_MSWRITE=mswrite -p PW_MSWRITE=${PwdMswrite} -p USER_IMDAS_DB=imdaspro_gis -p PW_IMDAS_DB_USER=${PwdImdasUser} -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration | oc apply -n ${namespace} -f-
